games.title: Our Games
games.description:
Explore our collection of retro-inspired arcade games.
Each game offers unique gameplay and challenges.

pong.title: Pong
pong.description: Fast-paced table tennis action! Challenge your friends and smash your way to the high score.
explications: Move your paddle up and down using the w/s keys (P1) or up/down arrows (P2)
Hit the ball with your paddle to send it back to your opponent
Score points when your opponent misses the ball
First player to reach 10 points wins the game

dino.title: Dino Run
dino.description: A challenging endless runner where you control a dinosaur avoiding obstacles in a prehistoric landscape.
explications: Press space bar or up arrow to jump over cactus and other obstacles
Press down arrow to duck under flying pterodactyls
The game speeds up over time, making it increasingly difficult
Your score increases the longer you survive
Try to beat your high score with each attempt
